thread.title: Middlesbrough boss Aitor Karanka faces international break axe if they flop again in Man United clash
thread.title_full: Middlesbrough boss Aitor Karanka faces international break axe if they flop again in Man United clash

author: Simon Bird
title: Middlesbrough boss Aitor Karanka faces international break axe if they flop again in Man United clash
text:
Sport Middlesbrough boss Aitor Karanka faces international break axe if they flop again in Man United clash Three winless months have Boro in the bottom three and another stinker on Sunday could force chairman Steve Gibson to act Share Karanka steered Middlesbrough up last season, but is now taking them straight back down (Photo: PA Wire) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Aitor Karanka faces a make-or-break clash with Manchester United at the Riverside on Sunday. 
Middlesbrough boss Karanka is fighting for his future after his side plunged deep into relegation trouble . 
He is in need of an improved display from his players to show they have a chance of conjuring an escape from the bottom three. 
The Spaniard’s tenure is likely to come under review during next week’s international break if his side flops again when they meet old pal Jose Mourinho's Red Devils. Alvaro Negredo and co are the division's lowest scorers and without a league win since December (Photo: Reuters) 
Chairman Steve Gibson is reluctant to sack the manager he has backed for the last three seasons, preferring loyalty to knee-jerk change. 
But Boro have not won a league game since December 17 – 10 games ago – scoring just 19 league goals all season. 
The bottom two, Sunderland and Boro, are the only teams in the bottom six who have not sacked their manager this season. poll loading Will Middlesbrough sack Karanka this season? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
